arStrings.szText: Helltide periodically rises in areas of Sanctuary. A new area is chosen at the turn of the hour.
Collect {c_highlight}Aberrant Cinders{/c} and exchange them for Tortured Gifts, chests containing loot of a specific item slot.
Navigate to these map markers to find Tortured Gifts.
Slay monsters in Helltide to build {c_highlight}Threat{/c} and attract increasingly perilous demonic ambushes.
Place {c_highlight}Baneful Hearts{/c} at {c_highlight}Accursed Nests{/c} in Helltide to summon a powerful {c_highlight}Blood Maiden{/c}.
